Primary Source Cooperative Lab Space

Welcome to the Primary Source Coop Lab Space.

The purpose of the Primary Source Cooperative of the Massachusetts Historical Society (the Cooperative, MHS) is to provide a platform designed and governed by consensus to assist the digital publication of documentary editions led by scholars studying the American long 19th century (1789â€“1914) and who would not otherwise have a portal for affordable, supportive online publishing. In this form, it serves the needs of people preparing relevant archival materials for distribution, enriching the work of scholars and users who seek to understand this critical period in American history, when revolution and reform were causing fundamental changes in social and political culture...

Projects

John Quincy Adams Diaries
Catharine Maria Sedgwick Letters
Roger Brooke Taney Papers

Tools

Co-reference Network Graph
Geo Reference Map
Subject Timeline Graph



Created by the Northeastern Digital Scholarship Group (DSG) in collaboration with the Massachusetts Historical Society (MHS). Designed to work alongside the MHS Primary Source Cooperative.
